titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-05-18 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 18, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers Rusty & Doug (Kershaw), and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Shorty Lavender, the Jordanaires, Millie Kirkham, Stringbean, Minnie Pearl (her first appearance after appearing on 'This Is Your Life'), and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 919th broadcast.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
